BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Addressing int4 flat flakiness (#121437) (#121758) This simplifies the setup and relaxes the similarity check. We can restrict the similarity check once we evolve the quantization algorithm in the future. (cherry picked from commit 2de1a3defe0cc97e090f3ee7505728d9ea123723)
